about.title: About GojuPedia
about.subtitle: Your complete source for Goju-Ryu Karate knowledge
about.description: The creator of this app has done his best to fill the app with the best available data from reliable sources and experienced karate practitioners.

dataQuality.title: Data Quality
dataQuality.description: All information in this app has been carefully selected and verified. We strive to provide the most accurate and up-to-date information about Goju-Ryu Karate.

community.title: Community
community.description: This app was created for the Goju-Ryu community worldwide. We appreciate feedback and suggestions to improve the app.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you would like to contact the app creator regarding the content or functionality of this app, you can send an email to:
contact.feedback: We appreciate your feedback and will respond as soon as possible.
